member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth
member.summary: A Bluetooth module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the bluetooth connection is connected.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.BluetoothConnected
member.summary: Raised when the state of is connected.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with Bluetooth activity. The state of the Bluetooth is passed to the delegate, so you can use the same event handler for both Bluetooth states.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.BluetoothDisconnected
member.summary: Raised when the state of is disconnectd.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with Bluetooth activity. Since the state of the Bluetooth is passed to the delegate, you can use the same event handler for both Bluetooth states.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.BluetoothState
member.summary: Represents the state of the connection.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Bluetooth.BluetoothEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the and events.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
